result.title: Answer of A question... sukular selale
result.content:
include<stdio.h>

int n,i,j,k,s; char arr[500]; int main(){ scanf("%d",&n);

for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    scanf(" %c",&arr[i]);

for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    s=0;
    for(j=1;j<=n;j++){
       if(arr[j+s]=='*')
         k++;
       s+=i;
    }
    if(k>=4){
       puts("yes");
       return 0;
    }
    k=0;
}
puts("no");
return 0;

}

Thanks for upvote :)
